feature.label: Repast Simphony
feature.description: Repast Simphony is a free and open source agent-based modeling toolkit that offers users a rich variety of features. Documentation on Repast Simphony, including a tutorial, can be found at http://repast.github.io
feature.copyright: Copyright (c) 2024 Argonne National Laboratory. All rights reserved.
